title: Intersection collision
creator_contributor_role: University of California, Los Angeles. Media Center, production company
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobiles - Equipment and supplies
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobiles - Design and construction
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Automobile driver education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Road safety
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Traffic safety
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Traffic accidents - Prevention
description: Provides information on intersection collision and on safety devices, and procedures that can reduce injuries. Discusses factors associated with door latch failure and motorist ejection, demonstrates the protection provided to motorists by the combined shoulder strap and lap belt, presents preliminary findings on tempered glass breakage, and illustrates car collision deformation and skid patterns.
